name: Solumnoid - beta demo (web)
description:
This is the web version of the Solumnoid beta demo.  Solumnoid is an old-school puzzle-platformer with a relaxing and slightly melancholic vibe.  See more game info at the main demo page:  https://treehann.itch.io/solumnoid-demo

The full version of Solumnoid is a Windows game. This web demo does not support saving.

Known issues:

  • "Anti push" button (Ctrl) is currently not working on web version.
  • Sound (particularly music) may not play for a few seconds after launching web version.
